full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RDO RJE RNAM PAR 'JOMS PA'I BSGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS BZHUGS, ,` BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE RNAM PAR 'JOMS PA'I SGO NAS DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA'I BSRUNG MA LHA KLU GZHI BDAG RNAMS LA YUL KHRUS BYA TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES YUL PHYOGS MTHA' DAG GI DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA RNAMS KYI MTHUN RGUD PA MTHA' DAG SEL BA'I THABS, YUL KHRUS BYA TSUL 'DI YANG KUN LA PHAN PA'I RGYAL SRAS MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, YUL KHRUS KYI PHYAG LEN NI, RNAM 'JOMS KYI MCHOD PA BDAG MDUN GYI MCHOD PA GNYIS, BUM PA'I GTOR DANG CHA GSUM GYI GTOR MA, LHA MA'I RNAM PA CAN GYI 'KHOR LO 'DZIN PA, KLU'I DRI GLUD MI'I RNAM PA CAN GYI SPRUL MGO CAN THAL MO SBYAR, GZHI BDAG RGYAL PO CHEN PO GSER MDOG CAN, MI'I RNAM PA CAN BUM PA 'DZIN PA, PHYUGS BZHI DRI GLUD BYA, RIL BU CHANG BU 'THEB KYU RNAMS BYA,, ,,)
